verses.verse: Hearken <S%H8085><s%> to <S%H7291>me<s%>, ye that follow after <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, ye that <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H5027>look<s%> unto the <S%H6697>rock<s%> whence ye were <S%H2672>hewn<s%>, and to the <S%H4718>hole<s%> of the <S%H953>pit<s%> whence ye were <S%H5365>digged<s%>.

Look <S%H5027><s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>, and unto <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> that <S%H2342>bare<s%> <S%H259>you<s%>; for when he was but one I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1288>him<s%>, and I blessed <S%H7235>him<s%>, and made him many.

For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5162>comforted<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; he hath <S%H5162>comforted<s%> all her waste <S%H2723>places<s%>, and hath <S%H7760>made<s%> her <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> like <S%H5731>Eden<s%>, and her <S%H6160>desert<s%> like the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%> shall be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8426>therein<s%>, thanksgiving, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H2172>melody<s%>.

Attend <S%H7181><s%> unto <S%H5971>me<s%>, O my people; and give <S%H238>ear<s%> unto <S%H3816>me<s%>, O my nation: for a <S%H8451>law<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H7280>me<s%>, and I will establish my <S%H4941>justice<s%> for a <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.

My <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%>, my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> is gone <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and mine <S%H2220>arms<s%> shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>; the <S%H339>isles<s%> shall <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H2220>me<s%>, and on mine arm shall they <S%H3176>trust<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and <S%H5027>look<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8064>beneath<s%>; for the heavens shall vanish <S%H4414>away<s%> like <S%H6227>smoke<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall wax <S%H1086>old<s%> like a <S%H899>garment<s%>; and they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H3654>manner<s%>: but my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> shall be for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> shall not be <S%H2865>abolished<s%>.

Hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H3045>me<s%>, ye that know <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, the <S%H5971>people<s%> in whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> is my <S%H8451>law<s%>; <S%H3372>fear<s%> ye not the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%>, neither be ye <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H1421>revilings<s%>.

For the <S%H6211>moth<s%> shall eat them <S%H398>up<s%> like a <S%H899>garment<s%>, and the <S%H5580>worm<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> them like <S%H6785>wool<s%>; but my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> shall be for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and my <S%H3444>salvation<s%> unto all <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

Awake <S%H5782><s%>, <S%H5782>awake<s%>, put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%>, O <S%H2220>arm<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; <S%H5782>awake<s%>, as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>, the <S%H1755>generations<s%> of <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H2672>times<s%>. Is it not thou that didst cut <S%H7294>Rahab<s%> in <S%H2490>pieces<s%>, that didst pierce the <S%H8577>monster<s%>?

Is it not thou that <S%H2717>driedst<s%> up the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep<s%>; that <S%H7760>madest<s%> the <S%H4615>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> to pass <S%H5674>over<s%>?

And the <S%H6299>ransomed<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> with <S%H7440>singing<s%> unto <S%H6726>Zion<s%>; and <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%> shall be upon their <S%H7218>heads<s%>: they shall <S%H5381>obtain<s%> <S%H8342>gladness<s%> and <S%H8057>joy<s%>; and <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> and <S%H585>sighing<s%> shall flee <S%H5127>away<s%>.

I <S%H5162><s%>, even I, am he that comforteth <S%H3372>you<s%>: who art thou, that thou art afraid of <S%H582>man<s%> that shall <S%H4191>die<s%>, and of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> that shall be <S%H5414>made<s%> as <S%H2682>grass<s%>;

and hast <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H6213>Maker<s%>, that stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and laid the <S%H3245>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and <S%H6342>fearest<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2534>fury<s%> of the <S%H6693>oppressor<s%>, <S%H834>when<s%> he maketh <S%H3559>ready<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%>? and where is the <S%H2534>fury<s%> of the <S%H6693>oppressor<s%>?

The captive <S%H6808>exile<s%> shall <S%H4116>speedily<s%> be <S%H6605>loosed<s%>; and he shall not <S%H4191>die<s%> and go down into the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, neither shall his <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H2637>fail<s%>.

For I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, who <S%H7280>stirreth<s%> up the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, so that the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof <S%H1993>roar<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.

And I have <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> in thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and have <S%H3680>covered<s%> thee in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that I may <S%H5193>plant<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and lay the <S%H3245>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, Thou art my <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Awake <S%H5782><s%>, <S%H5782>awake<s%>, stand <S%H6965>up<s%>, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that hast <S%H8354>drunk<s%> at the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of his <S%H2534>wrath<s%>; thou hast <S%H8354>drunken<s%> the <S%H6907>bowl<s%> of the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8653>staggering<s%>, and drained <S%H4680>it<s%>.

There is none to <S%H5095>guide<s%> her among all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> whom she hath brought <S%H3205>forth<s%>; neither is there any that <S%H2388>taketh<s%> her by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> among all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> that she hath brought <S%H1431>up<s%>.

These <S%H8147>two<s%> things are <S%H7122>befallen<s%> <S%H5110>thee<s%>, who shall bemoan <S%H7701>thee<s%>? desolation and <S%H7667>destruction<s%>, and the <S%H7458>famine<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; how shall I comfort <S%H5162>thee<s%>?

Thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> have <S%H5968>fainted<s%>, they <S%H7901>lie<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of all the <S%H2351>streets<s%>, as an <S%H8377>antelope<s%> in a <S%H4364>net<s%>; they are <S%H4392>full<s%> of the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of thy <S%H430>God<s%>.
Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> now <S%H6041>this<s%>, thou afflicted, and <S%H7937>drunken<s%>, but now with <S%H3196>wine<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> thy <S%H113>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and thy <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H7378>pleadeth<s%> the cause of his <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3947>Behold<s%>, I have taken out of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8653>staggering<s%>, even the <S%H6907>bowl<s%> of the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of my <S%H2534>wrath<s%>; thou shalt no <S%H3254>more<s%> drink it <S%H8354>again<s%>:

and I will <S%H7760>put<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H3013>afflict<s%> <S%H559>thee<s%>, that have said to thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>, Bow <S%H7812>down<s%>, that we may go <S%H5674>over<s%>; and thou hast <S%H7760>laid<s%> thy <S%H1460>back<s%> as the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and as the <S%H2351>street<s%>, to them that go <S%H5674>over<s%>.
